scripts.init:tool-site: cd tool-site && npm run init && cd ../
scripts.build:tool-site: cd tool-site && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:tool-site:localization: cd tool-site && npm run build:localization && cd ../
scripts.build:tool-site:web: cd tool-site && npm run build:web && cd ../
scripts.build:tool-site:service: cd tool-site && npm run build:server && cd ../
scripts.dev:tool-site:web: cd tool-site && npm run dev:web && cd ../
scripts.dev:tool-site:service: cd tool-site && npm run dev:server && cd ../
scripts.start:tool-site:service: cd tool-site && npm run start:server && cd ../
scripts.init:z-logger: cd golang/z-logger && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-wechat-robot: cd golang/z-wechat-robot && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-demo-server:service: cd golang/z-demo-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-go-demo-server:service: cd golang/z-demo-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o demo-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../

scripts.build:z-go-collect-server:service: cd golang/z-collect-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o collect-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../

scripts.init:z-go-qq-robot-server:service: cd golang/z-qq-robot-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-go-qq-robot-server:service: cd golang/z-qq-robot-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o qq-robot-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../

scripts.init:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run init && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.dev:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run dev && cd ../../
scripts.start:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run start && cd ../../
scripts.init:gin-template: npm run init:gin-template:web:default && npm run init:gin-template:service
scripts.init:gin-template:service: cd golang/gin-template && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-template: npm run build:gin-template:web:default && npm run build:gin-template:service
scripts.build:gin-template:web:default: cd golang/gin-template/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-template:service: cd golang/gin-template && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o template-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-template:web:default: cd golang/gin-template/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:gin-wechat: npm run init:gin-wechat:web:default && npm run init:gin-wechat:service
scripts.init:gin-wechat:service: cd golang/gin-wechat-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-wechat: npm run build:gin-wechat:web:default && npm run build:gin-wechat:service
scripts.build:gin-wechat:web:default: cd golang/gin-wechat-server/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-wechat:service: cd golang/gin-wechat-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o wechat-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-wechat:web:default: cd golang/gin-wechat-server/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:gin-one-api: npm run init:gin-one-api:web:default && npm run init:gin-one-api:web:berry && npm run init:gin-one-api:service

scripts.build:gin-one-api:web:berry: cd golang/gin-one-api/web/berry && npm run build && cd ../../../../

scripts.start:gin-one-api:web:default: cd golang/gin-one-api/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
